name: Escape The Room RPG Style
description:
There's this teenager boy trapped in an unknown room... Will you help him get out of there? Or will you give up trying because of his really rude attitude?

Kind of a short\long game, depending on your solving.

Two options for install: 1) Zip folder, for you to unzip it yourself. 2) EXE file to extract to game folder automatically. 

Either way, once extracted, hit the "Game.exe" file with the dragon icon. 

How to play: move with arrow keys, Enter to interact with objects, ESC to see menu- you will only need the items, save and game end sections. The other ones are not important in this game.
